meanings.definition: Brechans (noun): a type of rock formation characterized by angular fragments cemented together.

meanings.definition: Brechans (verb): to break or shatter into fragments.
meanings.sent1: The earthquake brechans the once sturdy building.

meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it would brechans into a million pieces.
